title: Brioches à tête
description: Brioche à tête (or parisienne) is a brioche baked into a fluted round tin with a ball of dough placed on top to form the ‘head’, the tête. Great for brunch with a strong coffee.  Equipment and preparation: You will need 16 brioche moulds.
ingredients: 6 free-range eggs, one egg beaten for egg wash
